George Oliver Panzer

  2. Foster Family: Unknown
  3. Location of Family: Unknown

  5. Arrival Place: Tekamah, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 6/26/1918, Manhattan, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1996-07-XX
